item.title: Shiren the Wanderer: The Mystery Dungeon of Serpentcoil Island Plus coming to iOS, Android
item.content:encoded:
• Smartphone

Includes all paid and

Spike Chunsoft will release dungeon RPG Shiren the Wanderer: The Mystery Dungeon of Serpentcoil Island Plus for iOS and Android for 3,500 yen, the company announced. A release date was not announced, and it is currently unclear whether the mobile versions are planned for release outside Japan.

Shiren the Wanderer: The Mystery Dungeon of Serpentcoil Island first launched for Switch on January 25, 2024 in Japan and February 27, 2024 worldwide, followed by PC via Steam on December 11, 2024.

As the “Plus” in its name implies, the iOS and Android release will include all of the free and paid downloadable content previously released for the Switch and PC versions, including the “Plus Pack” expansion.

Watch a new trailer below.

iOS and Android Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/shiren-the-wanderer-the-mystery-dungeon-of-serpentcoil-island-plus-coming-to-ios-android

item.title: GigaBash DLC ‘GAMERA: Rebirth’ now available
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Gamera and Guiron join the fray.

GigaBash downloadable content “GAMERA: Rebirth,” which adds new playable characters Gamera and Guiron in their GAMERA: Rebirth incarnations, is now available, developer Passion Republic Games announced.

Here is an overview of the downloadable content, via Passion Republic Games:

This downloadable content adds two new playable characters Gamera and Guiron in their GAMERA: Rebirth incarnations into the game, featuring their own unique skillsets and moves brought to life! From the silver screen to your screens, these legends of kaiju cinema are here to fight.

  • Gamera – Gamera emerges to protect those it was made to destroy. Gamera shows that defense and offense go hand-in-hand, with plasma jets to close the distance and flaming projectiles to engage at range. Its thick armored shell ensures no attack gets through. The guardian kaiju is devastating and dangerous at any distance.
  • Guiron – Slicing through at lightning speed, Guiron launches into the fray! With unmatched agility, Guiron wields its iconic bladed head to drive destruction into any who stand in the way. Its razor-sharp plasma Scale Shots threaten those who try to escape. This kaiju is a living weapon in name and purpose.

With this latest downloadable content, alongside previous crossover characters from other legendary kaiju and Tokusatsu franchises, GigaBash now features a massive lineup of 26 playable characters. Will you embody the cutting edge of Guiron and strike terror upon the world? Or will you don the shell of Gamera to purify and protect your allies?

GigaBash is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

Watch a new trailer below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

DLC “GAMERA: Rebirth” Release Date Trailer
